actions.committee: House Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to authorize the government of the District of Columbia to control the manufacture, sale, and storage of alcoholic beverages, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the District of Columbia Council to control the manufacture, sale, and storage of alcoholic beverages.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the government of the District of Columbia to control the manufacture, sale, and storage of alcoholic beverages, and for other purposes.
